name: wedraw-platform
description: 企业微信、公众号、小程序及积分商城管理平台

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:official" "npm run dev:wecom" "npm run dev:miniprogram" "npm run dev:points" "npm run dev:message" "npm run dev:analysis"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:official" "npm run start:wecom" "npm run start:miniprogram" "npm run start:points" "npm run start:message" "npm run start:analysis"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-center && npm install && cd ../official && npm install && cd ../wecom && npm install && cd ../miniprogram && npm install && cd ../points && npm install && cd ../message && npm install && cd ../analysis && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/admin-web && npm install && cd ../miniprogram && npm install && cd ../official-h5 && npm install && cd ../wecom-h5 && npm install && cd ../points-h5 && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/admin-web && npm run build && cd ../official-h5 && npm run build && cd ../wecom-h5 && npm run build && cd ../points-h5 && npm run build

author: WeDraw Team
